title: Eye Witness. No. 93
creator_credit: Hector Lemieux, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This is an inside story of the trucking business from the point of view of a driver of one of the huge long-distance trailer transports. He describes his customary 388-mile run between Montreal and New York and, in the process, shows what a highly organized operation trucking has become.
creator_credit_for_label: Hector Lemieux, Peter Jones and National Film Board of Canada
